summary: REQ-14 appears implemented by adding a project-domain config file set to "techmarket-digital" and adding domain-validation logic in a mainnet deploy script/docs. REQ-15 is not fully satisfied because the mainnet deployment record file is present but not filled with actual live URL and canister IDs; the diff also cannot prove an actual successful mainnet deployment occurred.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy (“push live”) the latest frontend and backend canisters to Internet Computer mainnet after the domain is set, and record the resulting live URL and canister IDs in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md.
missing_requirements.reason: The deployment record file is not filled with the required concrete values (live site URL and frontend/backend canister IDs). The diff shows placeholders/unfinished sections, and there is no evidence of actual deployed canister IDs or a completed deployment.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of frontend UI/content/SEO/styling changes unrelated to setting a project domain/slug and deploying to IC mainnet (violates the stated non-goal of not changing site content/copy beyond what is required for domain+deploy).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to set the project domain/slug and deploy/record mainnet info; the diff summary indicates extensive homepage section copy, layout, styling, animations, SEO metadata, contact links, and multiple component updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Added additional deployment documentation and a smoke-check checklist beyond the requested requirement to record live URL/canister IDs in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-15 specifically requires recording the live URL and canister IDs in frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md; extra guides/checklists/scripts were not explicitly requested (even if potentially helpful).
